scenes.text: It was a sunny morning in Carrot Town, with the hustle and bustle of everyone leaving their burrows to head to work. Today is the day you’re heading out to become an adventurer!
You pack up some gold and head out of your burrow to go straight to the adventurer’s guild until…
Hey you! Drop all your gold before I come over there and sucker kick you!
scenes.speaker: Robber

scenes.text: You turn around to see a thug bunny holding a wooden spear pointed straight at you! What are you going to do?!

choices.text: You get out of here before I sucker kick you!
Take all my money! Just don’t hurt me!
You’ll have to catch me first!

scenes.text: Ha! You don’t scare me you little bunny. I’ll show you whose boss right now!
scenes.speaker: Robber

scenes.text: The robber starts running towards you, ready to hit you with the spear. You get ready to launch a kick at the robber until the wind picks up and blows dust into your eyes! You close your eyes in anticipation of getting hit, but suddenly...
What a wuss! You should just go crying back to your mama and bring me some more gold while you’re at it!
scenes.speaker: Robber

scenes.text: The robber starts to slowly walk towards you as you take your gold out to put on the ground, but the pouch gets stuck inside your sack.
Stop pretending and hurry up and take out the gold!
scenes.speaker: Robber

scenes.text: The robber is ready to hit you with the spear and you close your eyes, when suddenly
Hey! You better not run!
scenes.speaker: Robber

scenes.text: You turn to run away and try to make a quick dash for it when you feel something tug onto your bag. The robber caught up to you! So fast!
Nice try kid, but now I’m really going to take your gold!
scenes.speaker: Robber

scenes.text: The robber shoves you onto the ground and gets ready to hit you with the spear. You close your eyes in anticipation, when suddenly
You hear a thump to the ground followed by a groan. You rub the dust out of your eyes and look up to see a knight bunny holding his sword over the robber!
Looks like I got to you just in time! You alright there kiddo?
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

scenes.text: The knight bunny helps you up and starts to brush some of the dirt off of your fur.
You almost had a little tussle there kiddo, thank goodness you were already close to the adventurer’s guild. You looking to be an adventurer?
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

choices.text: I totally had it under control
Not anymore, the outside world is scary!

scenes.text: That's the spirit! Let's get you over to the guild.
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

scenes.text: I'm sure you did. Let's hurry up and get you over to the guild.
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

scenes.text: Haha, no need to worry! How about I escort you over to the guild?
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

scenes.text: The knight bunny leads you inside the guild, and you can see all different kinds of bunnies.

text: You see a mage bunny flipping through a bunch of books,
a warrior bunny sharpening his ax,
an archer bunny stringing up his bow,
and a priest bunny praying over a bunny adventurer party

scenes.text: There’s all different classes that you can be, but I personally like being a knight
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

scenes.text: Anyway, let’s get you registered as an adventurer.
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

scenes.text: You and knight bunny walk to the guild counter where you are greeted by the clerk.
Good morning and welcome to Carrot Town’s adventurers guild! What can I help you with?
scenes.speaker: Guild Clerk

scenes.text: This fluff ball here wants to be an adventurer. Can we get them started with their paperwork?
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

scenes.text: Of course! We just need to get a couple of things started first before we can issue you a guild card. Let’s go through some housekeeping.
scenes.speaker: Guild Clerk

scenes.text: What is your name?
Alright! Now we just need to pick out a class you would like to be. I've listed out some options that you could try out!
scenes.speaker: Guild Clerk

scenes.text: What class do you want to be?
Sweet! Let me just fill this out here, stamp right there, and done! Welcome to Carrot Town’s adventurers guild,
scenes.speaker: Guild Clerk

scenes.text: You’ve done it! Congratulations on registering for the adventurers guild. But now what?
Good job kiddo, now you can go off onto the next town and see the cool sights as a newbie. I could be part of your party until the next town if you want, I have some business over there anyway.
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

choices.text: Thanks for offering, I'll take you up on that!
Gee I don't know, I think I'm actually just gonna stay home
Hmph, I don't need your help old man

scenes.text: No problemo fluff ball. If you’re ready, then let’s go get you some supplies before we head out of town.
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

scenes.text: Don’t sweat it kid, you totally got this. How about while we get you relaxed, we’ll get some supplies for you together before we head out of town.
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny

scenes.text: What a feisty fluff ball for someone so small. Let’s get you some supplies before we head out of town.
scenes.speaker: Knight Bunny
